name: Newsroom Director
tag_list: journalism, high-school, advisers, newspaper, publications, yearbook
overview:
Newsroom Director is an online collaboration suite for high school, college, and professional newspapers. In other words, it’s a program that simplifies the lives of the reporters, the editors, and the adviser by implementing internal messaging (like email), online article drafting and editing, calendars, staff-wide notices, and much more.

The key feature of Newsroom Director is the fact that it completely eliminates your need for paper. Gone are the days of printing out (or even handwriting) a story, and no more with confusing editing marks all over a page. Reporters can view edits to their stories with a single click, and make those changes even quicker.

Many newspaper staffs have problems with inter-staff communication. With Newsroom Director, those problems are no more. A messaging center, notices section, and staff “wall” are all crucial in the development and organization of your staff.
